DOC.brief_summary: It evaluate clinical efficacy Diclofenac 50mg ( NSAID ) compare association Codeine 50mg ( opioid ) administer 50 patient require extraction two third molar . After assess research parameter , comparative data analysis , along proper application statistical test , provide basis evaluation efficiency medication use .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Diclofenac Its Association Codeine After Lower Third Molar Extraction .
DOC.detailed_description: This research evaluate clinical efficacy Diclofenac 50mg ( NSAID ) compare association Codeine 50mg ( opioid ) administer 50 patient age less 18 require extraction two third molar ( similar position , whose degree difficulty high ) . It assess follow parameter : 1 ) onset duration surgery administration local anesthetic , 2 ) open mouth prior surgery , 2nd day operation 7th day surgery ( removal point ) , 3 ) subjective assessment pain use visual analog scale , 4 ) measurement facial edema second day operation 7th day surgery ( compare measurement obtain surgery ) 5 ) incidence , type severity adverse reaction . The analysis comparative data , along proper application statistical test , provide basis evaluation efficiency medication use .
DOC.criteria: Impacted low third molar use NSAID opioids last one month Local anesthetic allergy , History gastrointestinal bleeding ulcer , Kidney disease , Asthma , Allergy sensitivity aspirin NSAID opioids , Pregnant nursing woman , Patients use antidepressant , diuretic aspirin , Patients treatment quit drug
